semantics.label: Counter title
semantics.description: Make a title for the timer.

semantics.label: Textfield
semantics.description: Text to go with the counter, @counter specifies the time variable. Other variables: @chosenDate, @months, @weeks, @days, @hours, @minutes, @seconds.

semantics.label: Select type of counter
semantics.description: Select the type of counter to make.

semantics.label: Date to count down to, or up from.

fields.label: Hour
fields.description: Select the hour of the date, 24hour format.

fields.label: Minute
fields.description: Select the minute of the date.

fields.label: Day of month
fields.description: Select the day of the month.

fields.label: Select month
fields.description: Select the month to count up from or down to.

fields.label: Year
fields.description: Select the year to count up from or down to.

fields.label: Background image
fields.description: An optional background image for the Counter.

fields.label: Show text on top of picture
X position of text.
fields.description: The X-position of the counter text relative to the picture, in percentages. F.ex: 50% to center the text.

fields.label: Y position of text.
fields.description: The Y-position of the counter text relative to the picture, in percentages. F.ex: 50% to center the text.

semantics.label: Short format
semantics.description: Displays the short format for the date. For example: 2d, 3h and 4m left.

semantics.label: Countdown finished text
semantics.description: This text is displayed when a countdown has finished.
